thread.title: Malian migrant 'hero' meets French President Macron

title: Malian migrant 'hero' meets French President Macron
text:
Malian migrant 'hero' meets French President Macron 11:59am BST - 01:05
Mamoudou Gassama, a Malian migrant, received a certificate of bravery and dedication and a medal from the French President Macron after he saved a child hanging from a ledge. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Mamoudou Gassama, a Malian migrant, received a certificate of bravery and dedication and a medal from the French President Macron after he saved a child hanging from a ledge. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
